extensionName.message: TST Active Tab in Collapsed Tree

extensionDescription.message: Provides UI to show last active tab in a collapsed tree in Tree Style Tab.

config_onAction_caption.message: Action on last active tab on a collapsed tree

config_onAction_none.message: Do nothing special, and respect TST's default behavior

config_onAction_cancel.message: Do nothing, and cancel TST's default behavior also

config_tabDragBehavior_caption.message: When a tree is dropped outside of the tab bar

config_tabDragBehavior_description.message: Due to Firefox's restrictions, you need to decide it when you start dragging: how tabs are treated on dropped outside of TST's sidebar.

config_tabDragBehavior_tearoff_tree.message: Detach Whole Tree from the window (but impossible to create bookmarks)

config_tabDragBehavior_bookmark_tree.message: Create links or bookmarks from Whole Tree (but impossible to detach from the window)

config_tabDragBehavior_tearoff_tab.message: Detach Individual Tab from the window (but impossible to create bookmark)

config_tabDragBehavior_bookmark_tab.message: Create link or bookmark from Individual Tab (but impossible to detach from the window)
